title: Vampire with their weakness to the sun

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Attempt to convert someone to Vampire with their weakness to the sun (3615) at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may only convert every other night, or if you were unable to convert the night before
-If your target has any defense, is conversion immune, or is a member of an evil faction, you will instead deal a basic attack to them
-Only the newest member will visit the target to convert
-Due to a your weakness to the sun, you are unable to go outside during the day. You may still vote, but you will be unable to see day chat unless you have an umbrella
-You may gain an umbrella by killing an evil faction member, or any role with Umbrella in its name

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert or kill all who oppose you
